job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Required Skills: Expert in MySQL and one or more of the following: Oracle, Mongodb, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL, Kafka, Hadoop, Hbase or Hive Experience in Kafka for at least 1 year is Must. Bachelor's degree in computer science or Information Technology Expert in database and SQL tuning Expert trouble-shooter Authored software to do parts or all of your job Strong Shell, Python and SQL scripting to automate DB related jobs Familiarity with observability tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, Vividcortex, Solarwinds, Nagios, Icinga, Munin, Cacti, Wireshark Ability to work with development teams Familiarity with low level debugging tools: strace, tcpdump, gdb, lsof and netstat Familiarity with Splunk Expertise in setting up and testing backups Responsibilities: Respond to issues within the Service Level Objective during your assigned on-call rotation Support 1 of 2 of these tracks of technology Kafka, ElasticSearch+LogStash+Kibana and RabbitMQ MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL Write software to improve the reliability, scalability and performance of Client’s infrastructure Troubleshoot broken systems and services issues
